verbs.description: [ARG1: synagogue shootings] [V: is] [ARG2: a sign authorities should work social media platforms says former jewish community leader former jewish community leader gregg roman said tuesday that the shooting at the tree of life synagogue in pittsburgh last week is a sign authorities should team up with social media platforms to prevent future attacks if anything this is clarity and call for local state and federal authorities to work closer with platforms like twitter like facebook and also these alternative fringe channels like 4chan and gab roman former dir robert bowers instagram pittsburgh twitter jewish community relations council of pittsburgh director u s facebook gab social media synagogue gregg roman anti defamation league krystal ball the hill synagogue tree of life synagogue anti - defamation league community leader buck sexton]
